source.citation: Zurita Vintimilla, M.C. & Borz, S.A. 2025. Operational Speed in Skidding Operations by Cable Skidders and Farm Tractors: Results of a Nationwide Assessment. Applied Sciences 15(18):9921.
notes: GNSS + video data from 98 field days across 14 Romanian sites; 1.74M seconds recorded, 1.2M seconds analyzed.
Event-level speeds reported for cable skidders (SK) and farm tractors (FT) across driving/maneuvering phases.
Median speeds differ significantly between cable skidders and farm tractors for most events (Mannâ€“Whitney U tests).
Use these medians to override default travel speeds in grapple-skidder helpers when GNSS-backed data is preferred.
